input.sentences: there was a lot of snow this year .
we had to clear our lawn many times .
we were very warm and cozy inside .
but it was terribly cold outside .
output.sentences: Wintertime brought a lot of snow to the family's house.
At times, there was so much snow that the lawn was invisible under a sheet of white.
Inside the house, the family stayed warm and cozy.
The first snow of the year always meant that the outside air was terribly cold.
When it got cold, both day and night, the family stayed inside and kept warm together.
